text: If you believe in progress, re-elect Mayor Red Thomas.
Mayor Red Thomas' progress platform means more jobs, better education, bigger civic improvements in Lower Texas.
On election day, ask your vote for a proven leader.
This has got to be a dream.
Hey, kid, what'd you do, jump ship?
Well, what's with the life preserver?
I just want to use the phone.
You know where 1640 Riverside... Are you gonna order something, kid?
I can't give you a tab unless you order something.
Right, give me a Pepsi free.
If you want a Pepsi, pal, you're gonna pay for it.
Look, just give me something without any sugar in it, okay?
Hey, I'm talking to you, McFly, you Irish bug.
You got my homework finished, McFly?
Uh, well, actually, I figured since it wasn't due till Monday... Hello?
I gotta have time to recopy.
You realize what would happen if I hand in my homework and your handwriting?
I'd get kicked out of school.
You wouldn't want that to happen, would you?
Well, now, of course not, Biff.
I wouldn't want that to happen.
What are you looking at, butthead?
Hey, Biff, get a hold of this guy's life preserver.
The door thinks he's gonna drown.
So, uh, how about my homework, McFly?
Well, I'll, uh, I'll finish that on up tonight, and then I'll, uh, bring it over first thing tomorrow morning.
I don't want to see you in here again.
Say, what do you let those boys push you around like that for?
Don't you know if you let people walk over you now, they'll be walking over you for the rest of your life.
You think I'm gonna spend the rest of my life in this slop house?
I'm gonna make something of myself.
I'm going to night school, and one day I'm gonna be somebody.
You wait and see, Mr. Carruthers.
I'll be the most powerful man in Hill Valley, and I'm gonna clean up this town.
You can start by sweeping the floor.
Another one of these damn kids jumped in front of my car!
Help me take him in the house!
You've been asleep for almost nine hours now.
Dreamed I went back in time.
Well, you're safe and sound now, back in good old Miami.
